title: Mailvox: and you STILL believe it?
author: VD
content_html:
Nick expresses full faith and confidence in the US government:


If we cut and run now, then we will have made it clear that our word does not mean jack shit… and not one single government or people will trust us for the foreseeable future.

Yes, because they trust the word of the US government so much now…. I don’t see why they would, either. I certainly don’t.
content_text:
Nick expresses full faith and confidence in the US government:
If we cut and run now, then we will have made it clear that our word does not mean jack shit… and not one single government or people will trust us for the foreseeable future.
Yes, because they trust the word of the US government so much now….  I don’t see why they would, either.  I certainly don’t.
